post:
**Order Link:** https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&bid=16

**Price:** €5.10 for all 3 servers 
(a straight 5 divided by 3 is a recurring number which causes an issue if you cancel just 1 of the 3 later) 

**Details:**

**MiniVPS128 - NETHERLANDS**

* OpenVZ 7
* 1 CPU Core
* 128mb Ram
* 2GB Disk Space
* 500 GB Transfer p/Month
* /112 IPv6 range
* 1 x NAT IPv4

**MiniVPS128 - Phoenix USA**

* OpenVZ 7
* 1 CPU Cores
* 128 MB Ram
* 2 GB SSD cached Disk Space
* 350 GB Transfer p/Month
* 1 x NAT IPv4
* /80 IPv6

**MiniVPS128 - UK**

* OpenVZ 7
* 1 CPU Core
* 128 mb Ram
* 3GB Disk Space
* 350 GB Transfer p/Month
* /64 IPv6 range
* 1 x NAT IPv4

**Info:** the above products come without direct support, you may obviously open a ticket if your VPS is just dead for some reason and you are literally unable to resolve it on your own without admin intervention.

These are NAT IPv4 - not dedicated IPv4, you get a pre forwarded IPv4 SSH port and 20 other TCP/UDP ports

No Torrents, No Tor, no exceeding 30% of a core for more than an hour, no crypto, currency related activity.

**_When ordering you will see 1 location only, when you complete that locations details e.g. host name, root password, (just put ns1 and ns2 in the NS prefix boxes), when you hit the 'Continue' button you will be taken to the next location to enter the unique hostname/password details._**
